headline: Trump Had No Role In Health Care Act
abstract: His tweets Monday morning misrepresent his record on health care.
lead_paragraph: President Trump was not in Washington when the Affordable Care Act established a right to health insurance for Americans with pre-existing health conditions. His first legislative priority as president was a bill that would have repealed key parts of Obamacare and weakened such protections. His Justice Department is arguing in court that the entire law should be overturned.
keywords: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
